name: Pin Color Ballz
description:
Pin Color Ballz is a simple "Crazy AA" game - tapping strategy game for users of for all ages.

How to play Pin Color Ballz color game:
• Tap screen to shoot color arrows at the spinning wheel, aim to the same colour
• Do not let the arrows (color balls) collide
• Each level requires a certain amount of arrows to hit to complete
• Different levels spin, twist, and rotate in different directions and at different speeds
• Beware obstacles before the twisty circle target!

Features:
- 2 game modes: Endless & Normal
- Over 200 levels to master with more updated weekly
- The best experience with beautiful color balls
- Random great music background in each level
- Simple to learn yet hard to conquer
- Support global leaderboards

What level can you get to? Download Pin Color Ballz game right now to find out.
developers: Twin Dragons Creation & Technology Joint Stock Company
publishers: Twin Dragons Creation & Technology Joint Stock Company
